Name: FRAGROOM: Defenders
About the game: Fragroom by District Zero Fragroom: Defenders is a fast-paced cartoony session PVE (Player-vs-Environment) shooting game with straightforward gameplay. Survive the hordes of zombies keen to destroy your small store-based shelter. Aim, shoot, change position, grab a bonus, repeat. Invite your friends over and let the fun begin. The current version includes a list of cool features, such as: 7 playable rounds (Tower Defence Mode) 4 customized destructible meshes 6 customized weapons 9 different enemies Lots of character's skins In-game voice chat
